content: उद्भ्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Agitated, bewildered, distracted; °चेतनां <ls>R. 12. 74</ls>; gone mad; <ls>Mv. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Terrified, frightened; मारीचोद्भ्रांतहारीताः <ls>R. 4. 46</ls>; <ls>U. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Whirled, flourished, waved (as a sword). {@--4@} Wandering upwards. --तं {@--1@} Flourishing a sword. {@--2@} (°--तकं) Rising (in the air).
